characters.ears: Perks up and teleports to the kitchen when she hears the sounds of cooking
characters.tail: Moves along with her emotions, making her a terrible poker player
characters.title: Special Dreamer

characters.ears: Sometimes doesn't hear anything when she thinks about running
characters.tail: She always makes efforts to reduce her wind resistance
characters.title: Silent Innocence

characters.ears: Never fails to hear praise or the Prez's voice
characters.tail: Wags with excitement when she's receiving attention
characters.title: Top of Joyful

characters.ears: Wants to boogie when she hears Eurobeat music
characters.tail: Getting it all silky with a morning shower is her favorite part of the day
characters.title: Rouge Formula

characters.ears: Has perfect pitch
characters.tail: Sway gracefully like magnificent feather accessories of the stage
characters.title: Shooting Star Revue

characters.ears: Can tell apart people from her hometown just from their cheers
characters.tail: She's flexible enough, so there's no spot she can't reach
characters.title: Starlight Beat

characters.ears: She covers people's ears and asks "Guess who?"
characters.tail: Sometimes forgets it in her room (according to her)
characters.title: Red Strife

characters.ears: She gets strangely bashful when they're touched
characters.tail: Currently practicing a cool way to swish her tail
characters.title: Wild Top Gear

characters.ears: Completely betray her true feelings
characters.tail: Fights with her comb everyday to tame her curls
characters.title: Top of Blue

characters.ears: She comes running the second she hears "party"
characters.tail: She uses a tail spray sent by the folks back home
characters.title: Wild Frontier

characters.ears: Do not tremble in the slightest when she's doing a tea ceremony
characters.weak: Insects, disrespect for history and tradition
characters.tail: Can get bugs off her back without looking over her shoulder
characters.strong: Japanese sweets, Japanese culture, competitive karuta
characters.title: Rock-piercing Blue

characters.ears: Can hear someone say "one-on-one" from a mile away
characters.tail: Her glossy black tail is admired by many students
characters.title: Amazoness Lapis

characters.ears: Tend to stand very straight when she's around others
characters.tail: Swishes her tail excitedly when she talks about sports
characters.title: Elegance Line

characters.ears: Stand up straight whenever she hears someone count
characters.tail: Apparently grabbing the tail is a foul
characters.title: El ☆ Numero 1

characters.ears: Hear everything as a compliment
characters.tail: Seems to glisten when light hits it
characters.title: O Sole So

characters.ears: Her blood starts pumping when she hears fanfare
characters.tail: She never cared much for appearances
characters.title: Maverick

characters.ears: Twitch noticeably whenever she comes up with a pun
characters.tail: Even the hairs on her tail feel electric when she's giving a speech
characters.title: Road of Emperor

characters.ears: Droop ever so slightly when she takes care of flowers
characters.weak: Things that suddenly flash or move
characters.tail: Uses the same tail oil as her mother
characters.title: Empress Road

characters.ears: Their hair bristles when they pick up an "emotional wave"
characters.tail: She gets her tail done at a salon before concerts
characters.title: Super Express! Full Color Special

characters.ears: Occasionally stand straight and still when she hears something
characters.weak: Small, confined spaces (The gate, the gate!)
characters.tail: Just looks good without doing anything
characters.title: Blue Cloud Thumbing

characters.ears: She's been sensitive to noises since she was little, and was therefore easily startled
characters.tail: Has a hard time getting her tail through the hole in her pants when it's humid
characters.title: pf.Victory Formula...

characters.ears: Can pop her ears at will
characters.tail: Her tail wags ferociously when she lies
characters.title: Scramble ☆ Zone

characters.ears: Perk right up when they hear a command, even if she's dead asleep
characters.tail: Her tail's strong enough that she can stand on it... according to rumors
characters.title: MB-19890425

characters.ears: Change positions a lot when she's reading romance manga
characters.tail: She really works up a sweat, so she has a separate towel for her tail
characters.title: Straight Line

characters.ears: Can hear the faintest rumble of an empty stomach
characters.tail: Twirls around whenever she whisks ingredients
characters.title: Bono ☆ Alla Moda

characters.ears: Droop when she hears of other people's misfortune
characters.tail: She's mindful not to hit people with her tail
characters.title: Rose Dream

characters.ears: Never, ever touch her ears or forehead
characters.tail: The hairs stand on end when she gets an idea
characters.title: Tach-nology

characters.ears: Her best friend says "Even the way her ears move is annoying"
characters.tail: Expresses her joy, anger, and even sorrow
characters.strong: Cheering on friends, feeling her feelings
characters.title: Go To Winning!

characters.ears: Finds the sound of a metronome calming
characters.tail: She trims it to the most exact millimeter
characters.title: Meisterschaft

characters.ears: If she beckons you, it's because she wants to be spoiled
characters.tail: Ultra-soft and fluffy—almost captivatingly so
characters.title: Fille Éclair

characters.ears: She's proud to have ears most fitting of a tiara
characters.tail: Lovingly named "Princess Tail"
characters.title: Princess of Pink

characters.ears: Will win the struggle against her alarm clock someday
characters.tail: Involuntarily goes completely still when having her picture taken
characters.title: Authentic 1928

characters.ears: Only hear about half of what anyone says
characters.weak: Anything requiring three or more steps
characters.tail: Good luck grabbing it when she's in full-on Bakushin Mode
characters.title: Sakura, Forward!

characters.weight: Slight increase (the reason is a secret)
characters.ears: Likes cleaning out people's ears. Does not like having her ears cleaned
characters.tail: Great at calming children
characters.title: Murmuring Stream

characters.ears: Can hear every single one of her fans
characters.tail: She's mindful of how she sits so as not to mess up the hairs
characters.title: Absolute ☆ LOVE

characters.ears: Only pay attention to topics she's interested in
characters.tail: Unless you're a friend, touching it will earn you a swift kick
characters.title: Nevertheless

characters.weight: Slight increase (but not a big deal)
characters.ears: Big words go in one ear and out the other
characters.tail: She used to think spinning it would make her run faster
characters.title: Uraran First Prize ♪

characters.weight: Slight decrease because today is an unlucky day
characters.ears: Sometimes used as directional fortune-telling
characters.tail: Completely stops moving when she's fortune-telling
characters.title: Rising Luck ☆ Flood of Happiness

characters.ears: Often tremble slightly
characters.tail: Gets tangled often because she fidgets with it when she worries
characters.title: Blue/Raging

characters.ears: Always jerk a little anytime she hears "Natie"
characters.tail: She secretly brushes it late at night
characters.title: Poinsettia Ribbon

characters.ears: Uninterested in hearing anything that isn't first-rate
characters.weak: Things unsuitable for a king, such as crowds and heat
characters.tail: Even her tail movements are first-rate
characters.title: King of Emeralds
